title: Manoj M
text: I am a passionate robotics enthusiast with experience in embedded systems. Proficient in design thinking, project management, and collaboration, I am eager to contribute my skills to innovative projects that have a positive impact on society.

title: Manoj M
text:
Education
Dr.Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology | Pollachi
Bachelours of Electronic and Communication Engineering
2020 ‑ 2024 (Expected)

title: Manoj M
text:
Experience
Forge Innovation and Ventures | Innovation Engineer Trainees | Coimbatore Oct 2022 ‑ Feb 2023

Developed practical skills in design thinking, rapid prototyping, and electronics testing during ProtoSem. Acquired expertise in IoT, ROS, and Embedded Systems. Led an interdisciplinary team of 9 to design, develop, and deploy innovative solutions for real-world problems. Demonstrated

Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd | IoT intern | Coimbatore
Oct 2022 ‑ Feb 2023

During my internship, I gained practical experience in IoT technologies, including basic sensors and their interfacing with WDM, ESP32 programming using Arduino IDE, MQTT, Bluetooth and WiFi.
I also learned about IoT architecture and its gateway, regional parameters and security, addressing and activation, and end device activation and limitation.

title: Manoj M
text:
Projects
DeepInspect | Nov 2022 - Jan 2023

Developed a Raspberry Pi-based system with image processing techniques and laser points to aid in depth perception for monitoring and accurately identifying the size of cracks in underwater structures using a Pi cam.

POSE:STRAIGHT | Mar 2022 - Jun 2022

Designed and implemented a posture monitoring system using Arduino and ultrasonic sensors to detect incorrect sitting posture in office chairs.
